mean_cn: n.纪念像，纪念物，纪念碑，纪念仪式；  adj.记忆的
mean_en: a statue, stone, etc. that is built in order to remind people of an important past event or of a famous person who has died; a thing that will continue to remind people of somebody/something
sentence: The memorial of Confucius is built to remind us of his achievements.
sentence_trans: 修建孔子纪念像是为了让我们记住他的成就。
word_etyma: memor记忆 + ial形容词后缀，…的 → memorial记忆的；纪念物，纪念日
